entry.title: Sunday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries before morning. Risk of thundershowers early this evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to a few rain showers near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016
